critique: This document pertains to an amendment to Schedule A of positions excepted from examination under civil-service rules within the Department of Agriculture. It outlines the inclusion of temporary field workers (inspectors, scouts, etc.) employed in cooperation with states for enforcing the Plant Quarantine Act. These positions are limited to 180 days per year, and reporting requirements are specified. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power dynamics, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion aspects. Therefore, the initial scores are all set to 0.
